verses.roman:
jaya śrotā-gaṇa, śuna, kari' eka mana
ratha-yātrāya nṛtya prabhura parama mohana

synonyms: jaya—all glories; śrotā-gaṇa—to the listeners; śuna—please hear; kari'-keeping yourself; eka mana—in one attention; ratha-yātrāya—in the car festival; nṛtya—dancing; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; parama—extremely; mohana—enchanting.
translation: All glories to the listeners of Caitanya-caritāmṛta. Please hear the description of the dancing of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu at the Ratha-yātrā festival. His dancing is very enchanting. Please hear of it with great attention.
